text: Birdwell F.C. was an English association football club based in Birdwell, Barnsley, South Yorkshire. ==History== The club was formed in the 19th century, and entered the FA Cup on numerous occasions before folding in 1928. Sheffield Independent, 24 August 1928, page 10Barnsley Chronicle, 23 May 1896, page 3 ==Honours== *Sheffield & Hallamshire Minor Cup League **Champions - 1895/96 ==Records== *Best FA Cup performance: 2nd Qualifying Round, 1921–22 ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire Category:Sheffield Association League Category:Barnsley Association League Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 1928 Category:1928 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: Birdwell F.C.
